languages.text: "Когда начался бунт, эти агенты вывели из игры многих подстрекателей мятежников и организовали оборону. Помимо того мне доложили о минимум трех случаях, когда подбивающие на мятеж блюстителей офицеры были расстреляны внезапно возникшими личными помощниками Иокасты. Похоже, она присматривала за наиболее неблагонадежными из своих подчиненных. Надо будет поставить Императору свечку в благодарность за то, что сделал ее такой подозрительной стервой".

"When the riot began, these agents took out many of the seditious officers and mounted a defence. In addition, I have been informed of at least three cases in which the officers inciting the enforcers to mutiny were shot by Jocasta's personal aides. It looks like she had already been keeping an eye on her least reliable subordinates. I should give the Emperor a candle in gratitude for making her such a suspicious hag."
languages.original_text: "Когда начался бунт, эти агенты вывели из игры многих подстрекателей мятежников и организовали оборону. Помимо того мне доложили о минимум трех случаях, когда подбивающие на мятеж блюстителей офицеры были расстреляны внезапно возникшими личными помощниками Иокасты. Похоже, она присматривала за наиболее неблагонадежными из своих подчиненных. Надо будет поставить Императору свечку в благодарность за то, что сделал ее такой подозрительной стервой".

traits.locale_text: "When the riot began, these agents took out many of the seditious officers and mounted a defence. In addition, I have been informed of at least three cases in which the officers inciting the enforcers to mutiny were shot by Jocasta's personal aides. It looks she had kept an eye on the least reliable of her subordinates. I should give the Emperor a candle to thank him for making her such a suspicious bitch."

It looks she had already been keeping an eye on her least reliable subordinates. I should give the Emperor a candle in gratitude for making her such a suspicious hag."

languages.text: «Cuando comenzó la revuelta, estos agentes eliminaron a buena parte de los oficiales rebeldes y organizaron la defensa. Además, se me ha informado de al menos tres casos en los que los ayudantes personales de Jocasta silenciaron a tiros a los oficiales que incitaban a los guardias al amotinamiento. Parece que ya tenía vigilados a sus subordinados menos fiables. Debería encender una vela al Emperador para agradecerle la desconfianza que le ha otorgado a esa arpía».
languages.original_text: "When the riot began, these agents took out many of the seditious officers and mounted a defence. In addition, I have been informed of at least three cases in which the officers inciting the enforcers to mutiny were shot by Jocasta's personal aides. It looks like she had already been keeping an eye on her least reliable subordinates. I should give the Emperor a candle in gratitude for making her such a suspicious hag."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando comenzó la revuelta, estos agentes eliminaron a buena parte de los oficiales rebeldes y organizaron la defensa. Además, se me ha informado de al menos tres casos en los que los ayudantes personales de Jocasta silenciaron a tiros a los oficiales que incitaban a los guardias al amotinamiento. Parece que ya tenía vigilados a sus subordinados menos fiables. Debería encender una vela al Emperador para agradecerle la desconfianza que le ha otorgado a esa arpía».

languages.text: 「暴動が始まると、この諜報員が反乱を起こした士官の多くを排除しって、防衛にあたりました。そのうえ、エンフォーサーの反乱を扇動した士官が、ジョカスタの側近に射殺されたケースが少なくとも3件あると聞いています。彼女は既に、到底信頼できない部下に目を光らせていたようですね。彼女をこんな疑心暗鬼の化身にしてくれた皇帝に、ロウソクを贈りましょう」
languages.original_text: "When the riot began, these agents took out many of the seditious officers and mounted a defence. In addition, I have been informed of at least three cases in which the officers inciting the enforcers to mutiny were shot by Jocasta's personal aides. It looks like she had already been keeping an eye on her least reliable subordinates. I should give the Emperor a candle in gratitude for making her such a suspicious hag."

languages.text: “叛乱爆发的时候，那些特工干掉了很多煽动叛乱的军官，还构建了防御工事。除此之外，我至少听说了三起煽动叛乱的军官被约卡斯塔的私人执法者枪杀的事件。看来，她早就开始监视她那些不太可靠的下属了。我准备给帝皇点支蜡烛，感谢祂把约卡斯塔变成了疑神疑鬼的老妖婆。”
languages.original_text: "When the riot began, these agents took out many of the seditious officers and mounted a defence. In addition, I have been informed of at least three cases in which the officers inciting the enforcers to mutiny were shot by Jocasta's personal aides. It looks like she had already been keeping an eye on her least reliable subordinates. I should give the Emperor a candle in gratitude for making her such a suspicious hag."

languages.text: "Als der Aufstand begann, haben diese Agenten viele der abtrünnigen Offiziere eliminiert und eine Verteidigung organisiert. Darüber hinaus wurde mir von mindestens drei Fällen berichtet, in denen die Offiziere, welche die Enforcers zur Meuterei angestachelt hatten, von Jocastas persönlichen Dienern erschossen wurden. Sie hatte ihre weniger vertrauenswürdigen Untergebenen offenbar schon im Auge behalten. Ich sollte dem Imperator danken, dass er entschieden hat, sie zu einer derart misstrauischen Hexe zu machen."
languages.original_text: "When the riot began, these agents took out many of the seditious officers and mounted a defence. In addition, I have been informed of at least three cases in which the officers inciting the enforcers to mutiny were shot by Jocasta's personal aides. It looks like she had already been keeping an eye on her least reliable subordinates. I should give the Emperor a candle in gratitude for making her such a suspicious hag."

"Als der Aufstand begann, haben diese Agenten viele der abtrünnigen Offiziere eliminiert und eine Verteidigung organisiert. Darüber hinaus wurde mir von mindestens drei Fällen berichtet, in denen die Offiziere, welche die Enforcers zur Meuterei angestachelt hatten, von Jocastas persönlichen Dienern erschossen wurden. languages.text: « Lorsque l'émeute a commencé, ces mêmes agents ont abattu bon nombre des officiers séditieux et sont parvenus à organiser une défense. J'ai également été informé d'au moins trois cas d'officiers abattus par les aides personnels de Jocasta après avoir tenté d'inciter les prévôts à la mutinerie. Il semblerait qu'elle ait gardé un œil même sur ses propres subordonnés. Je devrais allumer un cierge pour remercier l'Empereur d'avoir rendu cette garce aussi suspicieuse. »
languages.original_text: "When the riot began, these agents took out many of the seditious officers and mounted a defence. In addition, I have been informed of at least three cases in which the officers inciting the enforcers to mutiny were shot by Jocasta's personal aides. It looks like she had already been keeping an eye on her least reliable subordinates. I should give the Emperor a candle in gratitude for making her such a suspicious hag."

J'ai également été informé d'au moins trois cas d'officiers abattus par les aides personnels de Jocasta après avoir tenté d'inciter les prévôts à la mutinerie. Il semblerait qu'elle ait gardé un œil même sur ses propres subordonnés. Je devrais allumer un cierge pour remercier l'Empereur d'avoir rendu cette garce aussi suspicieuse. »

languages.text: "İsyan çıktığında bu hizmetkârlar, hain subayların çoğunu haklayıp savunma hattı kurmuş. Ayrıca Jocasta'nın hizmetkârlarının infazcıları isyana teşvik eden subayları vurduğuna dair üç farklı rapor aldım. Belli ki itimat etmediği astlarını zaten gözünün önünden ayırmıyormuş. Onu böylesi şüpheci bir cadaloz olarak yarattığı için İmparator'a şükretmem lazım."
languages.original_text: "When the riot began, these agents took out many of the seditious officers and mounted a defence. In addition, I have been informed of at least three cases in which the officers inciting the enforcers to mutiny were shot by Jocasta's personal aides. It looks like she had already been keeping an eye on her least reliable subordinates. I should give the Emperor a candle in gratitude for making her such a suspicious hag."
